languages.text: {n}Вкупе с бледной кожей и тиком все складывается в известные вам симптомы. Видимо, когда-то Инцендия подверглась заморозке, выход из которой произошел с ошибкой и повредил ее нервную систему.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вкупе с бледной кожей и тиком все складывается в известные вам симптомы. Видимо, когда-то Инцендия подверглась заморозке, выход из которой произошел с ошибкой и повредил ее нервную систему.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms you recognise. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вкупе с бледной кожей и тиком все складывается в известные вам симптомы. Видимо, когда-то Инцендия подверглась заморозке, выход из которой произошел с ошибкой и повредил ее нервную систему.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms familiar to you. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}

{n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms familiar to you. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}

{n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms you recognise. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}

{n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms you recognise. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}

{n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms you recognise. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}

languages.text: {n}青白い肌とチック症が合わさって、他人の目にも明らかな症状となっている。インセンディアはかつて低温保存措置を受けたのだろう。そのときに、彼女の神経系に損傷を与える過失が生じたのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms you recognise. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}青白い肌とチック症が合わさって、他人の目にも明らかな症状となっている。インセンディアはかつて低温保存措置を受けたのだろう。そのときに、彼女の神経系に損傷を与える過失が生じたのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}她的皮肤苍白得几近病态，身体时不时地抽搐着，这些迹象都佐证了你的猜想。看起来，因森蒂娅曾经进过冷冻舱，但在解冻时出了一问题，损伤了她的神经系统。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms you recognise. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}她的皮肤苍白得几近病态，身体时不时地抽搐着，这些迹象都佐证了你的猜想。看起来，因森蒂娅曾经进过冷冻舱，但在解冻时出了一问题，损伤了她的神经系统。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Entre la piel pálida y el tic, reconoces los síntomas. Parece que Incendia fue sometida a criosuspensión y, cuando estaba saliendo, un error causó daños a su sistema nervioso.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms you recognise. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Entre la piel pálida y el tic, reconoces los síntomas. Parece que Incendia fue sometida a criosuspensión y, cuando estaba saliendo, un error causó daños a su sistema nervioso.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ces symptômes, combinés à la pâleur de sa peau, ne peuvent signifier qu'une chose : un incident de cryostase, une erreur au moment de la sortie qui a endommagé son système nerveux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms you recognise. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ces symptômes, combinés à la pâleur de sa peau, ne peuvent signifier qu'une chose : un incident de cryostase, une erreur au moment de la sortie qui a endommagé son système nerveux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zusammen mit der blassen Haut und dem Tick ergibt sich ein Symptombild, das du kennst. Incendia hat sich wohl früher einmal in Cryo-Stase befunden, und beim Erwachen muss ein Fehler ihr Nervensystem geschädigt haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms you recognise. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zusammen mit der blassen Haut und dem Tick ergibt sich ein Symptombild, das du kennst. Incendia hat sich wohl früher einmal in Cryo-Stase befunden, und beim Erwachen muss ein Fehler ihr Nervensystem geschädigt haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solgun cildi ve tiki de düşünüldüğünde parçalar yerine oturuyor. Anlaşılan İncendia bir zamanlar kriyojenik staza maruz kalmış ve çıkışında sinir sistemine zarar veren bir hata meydana gelmiş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Coupled with the pale skin and the tic, everything adds up to symptoms you recognise. It seems that Incendia was once subjected to cryo-stasis, and as she was coming out of it, some error occurred that damaged her nervous system.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solgun cildi ve tikini bir arada düşündüğünde parçalar yerine oturuyor. Anlaşılan İncendia bir zamanlar kriyojenik staza maruz kalmış ve çıkışında sinir sistemine zarar veren bir hata meydana gelmiş.{/n}
